description:
In the heart of Midtown.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids).

Part of Wyndham Hotels.  Check in at the front desk

Close to grand central station.
name: Wyndham 2 doubles hotel room
review: Rich's place is very close to UN headquater and central station, the flat is a standard hotel room, clean and nice with very friendly front desk people and 24 hours check in. Also have access to 33rd floor owner's lounge,the view is magnificent!
